name: Flip the Script
flavor: You try a different take on events, justifying the new locations everyone ended up in.
target: Self and each ally in the area

metadata.flavor: You try a different take on events, justifying the new locations everyone ended up in.
metadata.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target can teleport up to 5 squares. Any teleported target who was slowed is no longer slowed.
